message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DB

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper deals with text analytics and natural language processing, which falls under the purview of this sub-category.
2. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The paper proposes a text-preprocessing framework to filter out semantic noise, which is a common problem in information retrieval tasks.
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The proposed framework is unsupervised and uses contextual information to filter out noise, which is a machine learning approach.
4. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper deals with improving the accuracy of text analytics, which is a common application of AI.
5. cs.DB (Databases) - The paper proposes a technique to associate meta-data with categorical corpus text, which is relevant to database management.
